bibl.title: Reading as Seeing: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309 and Greek Art.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: PAPALEXANDROU, Nassos

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. xi, 20-xiv, 1 = 71-88 Austin-Bastianini; coll. xiv, 30-xv, 22 = 95-101 Austin-Bastianini.
PAPALEXANDROU Nassos, Reading as Seeing: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309 and Greek Art.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 247-258 et pll. 2-4 (pp. 346-348).
